name: Archipelago Tower Defense (Downloadable For PC)
description:
Archipelago Tower Defense

The game was taken place in the largest kingdom in the Indies-Pacific named Archipelagos Region (Alternate Universe of Indonesia in Fantasy). The story follows a magic kingdom  of Archipelago who have been attacked by many kingdoms around the world of medieval era's.  The Archipelago Kingdom is a very large, successful and advanced country in this era both in the technology, science, politics, natural resources and even the implementation of magic.  So that the reason for the troops from various surrounding kingdoms are jealous and want to conquer this land and take advantage of all resources and civilization of this kingdom. So then the battle began, to defend the Archipelago Kingdom from the onslaught of various kingdom army on their land by using their very powerful and modern 'magical tower'.

Game Features:

  • Main Story
  • Contain "Archipedia book", for the tower and enemy information

Rating Game:  Everyone (E)

Installment Instruction:

  1. Extract the Zipped  folder you've just downloaded.
  2. And then unzipped folder.
  3. Double click on .exe file application to run the game.

Social Media:

  • Instagram: @archipelago.td
  • YouTube   : Capstone 38
